about_the_game:
Want to wind down and relax on something without having to worry about any specific objectives? Welcome to Squash Ball! The ultimate idle clicker sandbox game with physics, themes, clicking stats, and a leveling system.

This game is perfect for casual gamers and those who love to fidget with items digitally. This game offers a relaxing yet engaging experience that will keep you coming back for more. Squash Ball is a satisfying escape from the daily grind. Whether you're looking to kill some time, relieve stress, or simply enjoy the satisfying mechanics, this game has something for everyone. With its colorful design and addicting gameplay, it's easy to pick up and hard to put down. We hope you enjoy your time playing!

name: Squash Ball

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 9 5900X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Speakers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400 @ 2.60GHz (12 CPUs), ~2.6GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Speakers
